title: Harnessing bio-based chelating agents for sustainable synthesis of AgNPs: Evaluating their inherent attributes and antimicrobial potency in conjunction with honey
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Muneeb Irshad, Anum Mukhtar, Asif Nadeem Tabish, Muhammad Bilal Hanif, Mahshab Sheraz, Viktoriia Berezenko, Muhammad Zubair Khan, Farwa Batool, Muhammad Imran, Muhammad Rafique, Jacek Gurgul, Thamraa Alshahrani, Michał Mosiałek, Juran Kim, Richard T. Baker, Martin Motola
